name: Carrom Slam!
description:
Carrom Slam! is an immersive multiplayer simulation of the classic board game Carrom, available on Steam. Experience the thrill of competitive carrom matches and other extra challenges with or against friends and players online.

Overview:



Carrom Slam! brings the beloved game of Carrom to life in a virtual setting, providing an authentic multiplayer experience for enthusiasts and for those who grew up playing. Engage in intense matches, showcasing your skills and strategies in various game modes. With a range of customization options and rule variations, Carrom Slam! offers a personalized gameplay experience that caters to your preferences.

Key Features:



Multiplayer Excitement: Team up with friends or join players online from around the world to engage in thrilling Carrom matches. Compete against skilled opponents and showcase your strategic prowess.

Diverse Game Modes: Carrom Slam! offers a range of game modes to cater to different preferences. Dive into the traditional rules of Carrom with the Professional mode, where you must skillfully cover the queen. Earn points by pocketing carrommen of different colors in the Points mode, or challenge yourself with the Disc Pool mode that excludes the queen. For a fast-paced experience, Blitz mode allows for rapid striker shots every two seconds. Additionally, the Training mode offers a chance to hone your skills alone or with friends.

Customization Options: Tailor your gameplay experience with extensive customization features. Adjust the turn timer to suit your desired pace of play. Choose to place the striker on the baselines or anywhere on the board, allowing for strategic positioning. Determine whether backshots are allowed or not, adding an extra layer of challenge and complexity to the game.

Master the Art of Pocketing: Show off your precision and accuracy as you aim to pocket carrommen. Each mode presents unique opportunities and challenges to test your abilities. Can you achieve the coveted Slam by pocketing all your pieces in a single turn?

Immersive Gameplay: Carrom Slam! provides an immersive gameplay experience, recreating the physics and mechanics of real-world carrom. Enjoy smooth controls and intuitive gameplay that captures the essence of the traditional board game.

Competitive Online Matches: Engage in intense multiplayer matches against friends or by joining public lobbies. Test your skills, strategize your shots, and strive for victory to establish your dominance in the Carrom Slam! community.

Carrom Slam! offers an exciting multiplayer experience, combining the nostalgia of a classic board game with the convenience and global connectivity of online gameplay. Prepare to strike, pocket, and dominate the carrom board as you unleash your skills in this action-packed multiplayer showdown. Are you ready to become the ultimate Carrom Slam! champion?
